Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for the compute workloads, including the type of applications, expected performance, scalability needs, and budget constraints.
Design the architecture for the compute cluster, including node types, storage requirements, and network configurations.
Install and configure Azure CycleCloud on a virtual machine or server. Ensure the environment is ready for cluster deployment.
Set up authentication mechanisms and access control policies to ensure secure access to the Azure CycleCloud environment.
Define and deploy the compute cluster using Azure CycleCloud. Configure node types, scaling policies, and resource allocation.
Apply security best practices, such as encryption for data at rest and in transit, and configure firewalls and network security groups.
Run performance tests on the compute cluster to ensure it meets the required specifications and workloads can be processed efficiently.
Set up monitoring tools and alerts to track cluster performance, resource utilization, and potential issues.
Create detailed documentation of the cluster setup, including configurations, security measures, and operational procedures.
Conduct training sessions for the operations team on managing and troubleshooting the Azure CycleCloud environment and compute clusters.
Ensure the compute cluster setup meets all regulatory compliance requirements. Implement regular auditing procedures to verify compliance and security postures.
